title: Meta Unveils Biggest Llama 3 AI Model, Claiming Language And Math Gains
content: The release comes as tech companies are racing to show that their growing portfolios of resource-hungry large language models can deliver significant enough gains in known problem areas like advanced reasoning to justify fundings.
summary: The release comes as tech companies are racing to show that their growing portfolios of resource-hungry large language models can deliver significant enough gains in known problem areas like advanced reasoning to justify fundings.

title: Bodycam Footage Shows US Police Fatally Shooting Woman In Her Home
content: The killing of Sonya Massey, 36, over the 4th of July weekend has resulted in criminal charges against the officer who fired the shots.
summary: The killing of Sonya Massey, 36, over the 4th of July weekend has resulted in criminal charges against the officer who fired the shots.

title: What Hostage Freed From Hamas Captivity Told Benjamin Netanyahu
content: Noa Argamani, an Israeli woman freed from Hamas recently, met with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in Washington on Monday.
summary: Noa Argamani, an Israeli woman freed from Hamas recently, met with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in Washington on Monday.

title: Plane With 19 On Board Crashes During Take-Off In Nepal, 5 Bodies Recovered
content: A plane with 19 people onboard has crashed at an airport in Nepal's Kathmandu, local media reported on Wednesday. Videos from the spot show a large fire with plumes of smoke billowing at the airport.
summary: A plane with 19 people onboard has crashed at an airport in Nepal's Kathmandu, local media reported on Wednesday. Videos from the spot show a large fire with plumes of smoke billowing at the airport.

title: OpenAI Assigns New Project To AI Safety Leader Madry In Revamp
content: Aleksander Madry was the safety leader, working with the preparedness team that helps to evaluate artificial general intelligence readiness of the company's AI models.
summary: Aleksander Madry was the safety leader, working with the preparedness team that helps to evaluate artificial general intelligence readiness of the company's AI models.

title: Singapore Has World's Most Powerful Passport
content: Singapore edged past France, Germany, Italy and Spain to reclaim bragging rights as having the world's most powerful passport.
summary: Singapore edged past France, Germany, Italy and Spain to reclaim bragging rights as having the world's most powerful passport.

title: Free Trade Deal With India "Floor Not Ceiling Of Our Ambitions": UK

title: Prince Harry Set To Inherit Millions On His 40th Birthday: Report
content: Prince Harry is set to receive a huge payout on his 40th birthday later this year, according to a report. The Duke of Sussex will turn 40 on September 15.
summary: Prince Harry is set to receive a huge payout on his 40th birthday later this year, according to a report. The Duke of Sussex will turn 40 on September 15.

title: Democrats Rally Behind Kamala Harris After Biden Quits Presidential Race
content: With just a few weeks to pick a replacement for President Joe Biden, Democratic Party delegates rapidly rallied behind Kamala Harris, saying the circumstances require a quick and practical choice.
summary: With just a few weeks to pick a replacement for President Joe Biden, Democratic Party delegates rapidly rallied behind Kamala Harris, saying the circumstances require a quick and practical choice.

title: July 21 Was World's Hottest Day In At Least 84 Years: Climate Watchdog
content: The Earth experienced its hottest day in at least 84 years, with the global average temperature reaching a record high of 17.09 degrees Celsius on July 21, according to the European Union's Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S).
summary: The Earth experienced its hottest day in at least 84 years, with the global average temperature reaching a record high of 17.09 degrees Celsius on July 21, according to the European Union's Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S).

title: World's Most Powerful Passports List Released: Indian Passport Ranks At...
content: The latest ranking released by the Henley Passport Index puts India's passport at the 82nd spot, allowing Indians visa-free entry to 58 countries.
summary: The latest ranking released by the Henley Passport Index puts India's passport at the 82nd spot, allowing Indians visa-free entry to 58 countries.

title: E-Bike Battery Fire Leaves British Family Homeless, House Destroyed
content: The incident, which occurred in Doncaster, South Yorkshire, has highlighted the dangers of e-bike batteries and prompted calls for increased safety measures.
summary: The incident, which occurred in Doncaster, South Yorkshire, has highlighted the dangers of e-bike batteries and prompted calls for increased safety measures.

title: Kamala Harris Attacks Trump Over "Fear And Hate" In First Campaign Rally
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris assailed Donald Trump on Tuesday at her first campaign rally since replacing President Joe Biden as the Democratic presidential candidate, while a Reuters/Ipsos opinion poll showed her taking a marginal lead.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris assailed Donald Trump on Tuesday at her first campaign rally since replacing President Joe Biden as the Democratic presidential candidate, while a Reuters/Ipsos opinion poll showed her taking a marginal lead.

title: Joe Biden Seen For First Time After Absence Sparked Conspiracy Theories
content: US President Joe Biden was seen in public for the first time since he dropped out of the Presidential race and tested positive for COVID-19. His absence sparked rumours on social media claiming the 81-year-old leader's health was deteriorating.
summary: US President Joe Biden was seen in public for the first time since he dropped out of the Presidential race and tested positive for COVID-19. His absence sparked rumours on social media claiming the 81-year-old leader's health was deteriorating.

title: We Will Be A People-First Presidency: Kamala Harris At Campaign Rally
content: Republican presidential candidate and former president Donald Trump is relying on support from billionaires and big corporations, while hers is a people powered campaign, Vice President Kamala Harris said Tuesday.
summary: Republican presidential candidate and former president Donald Trump is relying on support from billionaires and big corporations, while hers is a people powered campaign, Vice President Kamala Harris said Tuesday.

title: Kamala Harris Leads Trump In New Poll After Biden Dropout
content: Vice President Kamala Harris is narrowly beating rival Donald Trump in a national presidential poll released Tuesday, one of the first conducted since US President Joe Biden ended his reelection campaign.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris is narrowly beating rival Donald Trump in a national presidential poll released Tuesday, one of the first conducted since US President Joe Biden ended his reelection campaign.

title: Trump Says Kamala Harris "Easier" Election Opponent Than Biden
content: Former US president Donald Trump said Monday his presumptive Democratic opponent Kamala Harris would be "easier" to beat in November's election than President Joe Biden.
summary: Former US president Donald Trump said Monday his presumptive Democratic opponent Kamala Harris would be "easier" to beat in November's election than President Joe Biden.

title: Biden Returns To White House After Exiting US Presidential Race
content: US President Joe Biden returned to the White House on Tuesday, after days of self-isolation at his Delaware House, with his doctors saying that his symptoms of COVID-19 have been resolved.
summary: US President Joe Biden returned to the White House on Tuesday, after days of self-isolation at his Delaware House, with his doctors saying that his symptoms of COVID-19 have been resolved.

title: "Grateful For Her Service": Joe Biden As US Secret Service Director Resigns
content: Following US Secret Service director Kimberly Cheatle's resignation over the agency's handling of former President Trump's protection, President Joe Biden thanked her "for her decades of public service" to the nation.
summary: Following US Secret Service director Kimberly Cheatle's resignation over the agency's handling of former President Trump's protection, President Joe Biden thanked her "for her decades of public service" to the nation.

title: Sri Lanka Apologises For "Forced" Cremation Of Muslim Covid Victims
content: Sri Lanka's government Tuesday formally apologised to the island's Muslim minority for forcing cremations on Covid victims, disregarding WHO assurances that burials in line with Islamic rites were safe.
summary: Sri Lanka's government Tuesday formally apologised to the island's Muslim minority for forcing cremations on Covid victims, disregarding WHO assurances that burials in line with Islamic rites were safe.
